justification: "Metacognitive performance was assessed using type 2 signal detection theoretic measure metacognitive sensitivity (type 2 AUC)."

measured_by: Visual dual-task paradigm (Full vs Diverted Attention conditions)
justification: Attention was manipulated "by comparing a condition where only the peripheral stimulus is task-relevant (full attention) against a condition where both the central and peripheral stimuli are task-relevant (diverted attention)", making the dual-task setup the measure of attentional allocation.
